system.description: Only damaged by magical sources. Avalanche. All within close DC 15 STR or entombed for [[/r 1d4]] rounds under mounds of earth. ELEMENTAL, FIRE A roaring column of flames. AC 15, HP 30/43, ATK 3 slam +6 ([[/r 2d10]]/[[/r 3d10]]) or 1 inferno, MV near (fly), S +4, D +3, C +3, I -2,
